title: REVIEW: Ortega Cheez-It Taco Shells

title: M&S launches 'just wrong' chocolate-coated chilli crisps and ...
snippet: Nov 16, 2021 · One thing for shoppers to consider is that the crisps are not vegan as they contain butter oil in the chocolate coating. Fans can find the crisps in store throughout the festive season.

title: 'I compared Doritos tortilla chips to Tesco, Waitrose and ...
snippet: Feb 7, 2022 · This is one of my favourite crisps , so I wanted to find out how Doritos' Lightly Salted chips compared to Tesco, Waitrose, and Lidl own-brand versions. Would Doritos reign supreme - or will there be a new supermarket brand that'll be crowned the champion of chips ?
reason: The news article is interesting because it involves a taste test between popular and supermarket brands of tortilla chips. This could be intriguing for food enthusiasts who are curious about comparing the flavors and quality of different products.

title: ‘Looks Like The Dorito Theory Is True’: Woman Orders 50-Count Box Of Doritos. Then She Opens One Bag
